## Critical Features Identified

### 1. Angular Gradient Text (7 Color Stops)
**Status**: ✅ Complete
- Type: ANGULAR gradient
- Stops: 7 color stops with precise positions
- Colors: #bc82f3, #f4b9ea, #8d98ff, #aa6eee, #ff6777, #ffba71, #c686ff
- Positions: 0.1673, 0.2365, 0.3518, 0.5815, 0.697, 0.8095, 0.9241
- **iOS Requirement**: iOS 15.0+ (AngularGradient API)

- Center: .center

## Warnings & Recommendations

### ⚠️ iOS Version Requirement
- **AngularGradient requires iOS 15.0+**
- Fallback strategy needed for older iOS versions
- Recommendation: Use `@available(iOS 15.0, *)` attribute

### ⚠️ Custom Fonts
- Design uses Poppins font family
- **Action required**: Add Poppins to project assets
- Fallback: Use SF Pro if Poppins unavailable

### ⚠️ Asset Placeholders
- No actual images detected in design
- Using placeholder shapes
- **Action required**: Add actual image assets to .xcassets

### ℹ️ Performance Considerations
- Multiple gradient layers may impact performance
- Consider caching rendered gradients
- Test on older devices (iPhone 8, iPhone SE)
